headline: WM Announces Cash Dividend
summary: HOUSTON, May 12, 2025--WM (NYSE: WM) today announced the declaration of a quarterly cash dividend of $0.825 per share payable June 20, 2025, to stockholders of record on June 6, 2025.

raw.headline: WM Announces Cash Dividend
raw.summary: HOUSTON, May 12, 2025--WM (NYSE: WM) today announced the declaration of a quarterly cash dividend of $0.825 per share payable June 20, 2025, to stockholders of record on June 6, 2025.

headline: Why Waste Management Stock Is Sinking Today
summary: Steady investment Waste Management is down on an otherwise tremendous day for the market.  The market has taken a "risk-on" stance toward the market today following news of a potential trade deal between the U.S. and China.  Ultimately, nothing changed for Waste Management or its operations.

headline: WM Q1 Earnings Call: Margin Pressure Despite Revenue Growth and Sustainability Investments
summary: Waste management services provider Waste Management (NYSE:WM) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 16.7% year on year to $6.02 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.67 per share was 5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: 3 Profitable Stocks in the Doghouse
summary: A company with profits isn’t always a great investment. Some struggle to maintain growth, face looming threats, or fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their future potential.
